mapper.select: SELECT division_code AS divisionCode , dept_code AS deptCode , dept_name AS deptName FROM department WHERE division_code LIKE #{divisionCode}

SELECT DISTINCT e.emp_no AS empNo, e.emp_name AS empName, e.rank_no AS rankNo, r.rank_name AS rankName, e.dept_code AS deptCode, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY e.dept_code ORDER BY e.rank_no DESC) AS depth FROM employee e JOIN `rank` r ON e.rank_no = r.rank_no WHERE e.dept_code = #{deptCode} ORDER BY depth
